title: Chumi zan reh takah chuan
lyrics:
Chumi zan reh takah chuan,
Thlasik vur daifim hnuaiah,
Bethlehem bawng in tlawmah,
Lal Krista a lo piang ta;
Van mipui te'n an rawn thlah,
Kan sual min tlan tur,
Lei leh van Lal ni mahse;
Chham ang zalna ranthleng a lo ni.

Puan nem te'n amah tuamin
Ranthlengah a lu a nghat;
Rethei taka lo piangin,
A nu Mari thinlung chu,
Ngunhnamin a chhun tlang ta,
Pa Fa mal neih chhun,
Mi sual tana lo kal chu,
Davida khawpui veng in tualah.

Angel-ten kutin an chawi,
Zah takin chibai an buk;
Chumi zan khawhar takah,
A lu nghahna hmun tlawm chu,
Lal ropuinain a chhun;
Tin, berampu leh
Mi fingten chibai an buk;
Chham ang zalna ran in tlawm hnuaiah.

Keini pawh amah lawmin,
Bethlehem i pan ang u;
Van mi thianghlim sawi ang khan,
Nausen puana tuam ngei chu,
Ranthlengah va hmu ila;
Tin, a kiangah chuan,
Ni rei ni len ka duh ang;
Chham ang zalna ran in tlawm hnuaiah.
